name: Dilasa Janivikas Pratishthan
briefDescription: Dilasa Janvikas Pratishthan is organization working in natural resource management since last 21 years with a MISSION to give solace to the villages by improving the conditions of water, soil and vegetation along with the empowerment of women. With a diverse team of qualified, proven acumen and experienced Civil Engineers, Water Resources Engineers, Agriculture Engineers, Agriculture Experts, Social Mobilizers, most of them women. The first watershed Kaccheghati was developed as a showcase, and NABARD considered it as the Textbook of Watershed. Dilasa is a forerunner in its unique ideas of innovation. Dilasa is the first NGO to introduce Hot Water Chulla, different low cost structures in watershed. Empowerment of rural women is the Prime objective of Dilasa by promoting Self Help Groups movement since last over a decade, and formed more than 1500 women groups as of date.
